title: Timeless Polki Pendant - A Hyderabadi Heritage Piece
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds with excellent luster and clarity. The gold boasts a rich
warm hue characteristic of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship.
features: Exquisite Polki setting showcasing the natural beauty of uncut diamonds. Features a central, larger Polki diamond surrounded by intricate floral and paisley motifs. The pendant has a detailed filigree work and is accented with delicate droplet Polkis suspended from the base, creating a graceful movement and enhancing the brilliance of the piece.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi. This pendant can also be styled with modern attire for a touch of traditional elegance.
description: This pendant is a testament to the unparalleled craftsmanship of Hyderabad's jewelry artisans. The use of uncut Polki diamonds gives it a unique, raw elegance that cannot be replicated. Its timeless design ensures it will be a cherished heirloom for generations to come. Investing in this piece means owning a piece of Hyderabadi history and culture.
